nodes.text: Lamaredd was a location in the galaxy where the Quarren pirate Isquik Tors was active prior to his capture by the bounty hunter Boba Fett in 7972 C.R.C. Imperial Security Bureau agent Andressa Divo mentioned Lamaredd while writing to her father Tanivos Divo about Tors's capture.

Lamaredd was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo. It originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was a planet that was first mentioned in "Bartyn's Landing", an article written by Cory J. Herndon and published in Star Wars Gamer 7 in 2001.
